Posts.Content: Hey Goodbun I also receive Piriton prior 2 my Paclitaxel in case of any allergic reactions but they've never said wot they could b. The Piriton knocks me out & I'm asleep on & off 4 most of the session. It wears off by the time I'm due 2 go home which is fine as I drive myself 2 the hospital. I do have a lovely pinkish face the nxt day but blame that on the steroids. However over the course of the day it improves & no further meds r required. I'm just so glad I don't take any friends or family with me when I have this course of treatment as I'd feel guilty about snoozing the whole time & being unsocialable haha. 7 more weekly sessions to go with this regime then we'll c wot the nxt plan is (I've had 11 already). Hope urs is going ok Ciao  WB xx
Posts.Title: Piriton before paclitaxel

Posts.Content: Me 2 Gusidog, would rather b sleepy than suffer the potential side effects. We have enough going on.  I missed treatment on Friday due 2 dodgy bloods, fingers crossed 4 next week. Where r u in ur cycle of treatment? Dear daughter has made it home from Uni. Now I just need 2 pack a bag 4 our girlie mini break. ciao WB
